subject: Hockey, Ice
Television
Ratings and Rating Systems
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Blackhawks’ Game 6 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers attracted 8.28 million viewers on NBC, the most since 8.29 million watched Game 3 of the 1974 finals.
snippet: The Chicago Blackhawks’ Game 6 victory over the Philadelphia Flyers attracted 8.28 million viewers on NBC, the most since 8.29 million watched Game 3 of the 1974 finals.
